plays.text: Penalty to Brian Swanson 2 minutes for Hooking Pierre Turgeon
Goal scored by Derian Hatcher assisted by Niko Kapanen and Jere Lehtinen
Goal scored by Mike Modano assisted by Bill Guerin
Goal scored by Jason Smith assisted by Anson Carter and Josh Green
Penalty to Brenden Morrow 2 minutes for Hooking Marty Reasoner
Penalty to Jason Chimera 2 minutes for Interference Kirk Muller
Goal scored by Bill Guerin assisted by Philippe Boucher and Sergei Zubov
Penalty to Bill Guerin 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Jussi Markkanen
Penalty to Niko Kapanen 2 minutes for Hooking Janne Niinimaa
Goal scored by Janne Niinimaa assisted by Mike Comrie
Penalty to Jason Smith 2 minutes for Roughing Jere Lehtinen
Goal scored by Ethan Moreau assisted by Mike York
Penalty to Richard Matvichuk 2 minutes for Roughing Georges Laraque
Penalty to Scott Young 2 minutes for Tripping Steve Staios
Goal scored by Mike Modano assisted by Darryl Sydor and Philippe Boucher
